CustomField.description: Select Open for an ongoing Recurring Donation. Select Fixed for a Recurring Donation that has a specific number of installments. For Fixed, you must also populate the Number of Planned Installments field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select Open for an ongoing Recurring Donation. Select Fixed for a Recurring Donation that has a specific number of installments. For Fixed, you must also populate the Number of Planned Installments field.
CustomField.label: Recurring Type
